name: Richard
text: Entergy used them as a subcontractor to replace a telephone pole on my property. They gave no notice to turning off my power and they left trash all over my yard.

name: Caleb Abbott
text: Was going 70 in a 70 and 2 trucks owners by this company passed me then hit the brakes and slowed us down to 60. I passed them and then they did it again.

name: Jerome Ryals
text: They came too Mobile,After Hurricane Sally and restored our power in a couple of hrs,had been without power for 4 days,thanks guys❤

name: Jennifer K
text: This company came out and restored our power today in Etowah County. A tree had fallen on the line from the storms that came through on Saturday January 11, 2020. We had been without power for 24 hours. They were quick, professional, and nice. We really appreciate the job well done.

name: Cassie Jones
text: I was almost hit head on in a parking lot by one of their trucks with my 3 year old in the car. I blew my horn to alert him that he was in my lane and needed to move over and he proceeded to get as close to my car as possible, blow his horn,  stop and open his door as if he was going to get out and approach my vehicle. US DOT 2862106 was the # of the truck. I called the number on their website twice, with no answer.

name: Sherry Owens
text: Bobby Crowes group was excellent. Could not ask for a better group of guys. Very well mannered. Very respectable. And Kevin Tolbert was absolutely top notch. Just a great guy..

name: Mallorie Thomas
text: These gentlemen are very professional! They had to come here twice to cut out from under the power lines in Blount Co. Both times they were courteous, professional and very kind. The first time the young man cut gingerly around my lillies that were planted around the power pole. They had to come back a couple of days ago and again were very professional. They cleaned up their mess and left nothing to be cleaned or raked. I have encountered them on Hwy 31 when I have to leave the house and that is a VERY dangerous road. They are alert and aware of the traffic and keep it flowing. Top rate, professional men!

name: Jon Powell
text: Fantastic operation! Best in the business!

name: S1CKLIFE
text: Horrible company management forces them to do Jobs in an unsafe manner to increase productivity or get fired somebody is going to get killed working like that

resp.text: Penhall Company's most important value IS safety.

name: Ms.Joyce Murphy
text: Trax did miracles on my property that another contractor had really messed!!! I’m forever indebted to Mr. Justin and his awesome crew. May you be blessed with dozens of contracts and prosperity!
